[Groovy] Class ProcessVarDefController

      • ProcessVarDefController

      • Process variable definition controller class is used for working with variable definitions. It is possible to add/change/delete variables, also the input for variable value (widget) is changed according to selected variable type.

        Authors:
        Stephan Albers
        July Karpey
